column4: People I have tried everything under the sun to try and get normal resolution.
Can someone please tell me how to erase X completely and start everything from scratch?
why would you want to do that?
no, just restart X should be enough
Did what you said and when i did ctrl-alt-backspace to get back in i nevber got the low graphics mode message
but I can still only run at 800x600
what modes does your setup support. use a terminal and issue this command.  xrandr
VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation GeForce 6100 nForce 405
I accidentaly closed it can you do again?
What is this meant to do?
take you here if you followed the instructions - https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/Nvidia
When I go to the Hardware drivers menu it just says no restricted drivers and gives me no options to install one
try using the envyng app to install the drivers perhaps.
